channel.title: R on Sahir's blog
channel.description: Recent content in R on Sahir's blog

item.title: Variable Selection and Prediction in Competing Risk Regression
item.description: Objective The main goal of this post is to: Show one way of performing variable selection in a competing risks regression model Evaluate the predictive performance for a list of models using resampling methods What the data looks like We will use the bmtcrr dataset from the casebase package available on CRAN. Here is what the data looks like: pacman::p_load(casebase) head(bmtcrr) ## Sex D Phase Age Status Source ftime ## 1 M ALL Relapse 48 2 BM+PB 0.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
